1.title: Shillong
1.plot: Priyanshu is an aspiring music composer who is in Shillong chasing the lead singer of a rock band when he accidentally meets his school classmate, Anshul, who is on a bike trip across north-east. They co-incidentally are staying at the same hotel and decide to hang out together.

2.title: 3am Waali Baatein
2.plot: Anshul decides to accompany Priyanshu to a club where his crush is performing. The two of them then go for a walk and have an extremely personal and heartfelt conversation.

3.title: Impulsive Planning Disorder
3.plot: Priyanshu is in a cab which is racing a bit rashly trying to catch the band once again when the cab crashes into Anshul's bike. The two are once again forced to hang out where Anshul narrates her extremely specific road trip plans.

imdb.plot outline: The story revolves around the two ex-schoolmates who bump into each other while on the trip to Shillong. Priyanshu, an aspiring music composer who is in Shillong chasing the girl of a rock band accidentally meets his classmate Anshul Chauhan who is on a solo bike trip across northeast. Two meet unexpectedly and fall in love, or maybe they don't, but both of them have been giving some really adorable vibes.
imdb.title: Soulmates
plot: The story revolves around the two ex-schoolmates who bump into each other while on the trip to Shillong. Priyanshu, an aspiring music composer who is in Shillong chasing the girl of a rock band accidentally meets his classmate Anshul Chauhan who is on a solo bike trip across northeast. Two meet unexpectedly and fall in love, or maybe they don't, but both of them have been giving some really adorable vibes.
